name: Own Luck [GMTK Game Jam 2022]
description:
You find yourself in some sort of labyrinth. You must get out of here but for some reason, the labyrinth requires specific skills. 

Every 30 seconds your abilities change and you'll have to figure out how to get out of here.

 

It's time to create your own luck

Designed & Developed by

@Pdanieq627

@Alex Alcaide
